word:
(1869) 2T 352
     488. Grains and fruits prepared free from grease, and in as natural a condition as possible, should be the food for the tables of all who claim to be preparing for translation to heaven. 
     [TO EDUCATE OURSELVES TO SUBSIST ON FRUITS, GRAINS, AND VEGETABLES--514] 
     [GRAINS A CONSTITUENT OF HEALTH FOODS--399, 400, 403, 404, 407, 810]
